title: Anti-ISIS Satire Lampoons Militant Group's Hypocrisy
teaser: Audie Cornish talks to professor Arwan Kraidy, who studies TV and social media in the Arab world, about the slapstick sketches and music videos that poke fun at ISIS in sometimes bizarre ways.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
